name: create-webloc-file
title: Create webloc file
description: Simple extension for creating a .webloc file from a URL.
author: mjf5

commands.name: create-webloc-file
commands.title: Create webloc file
commands.description: Open new text file, with the text required to save it as a .webloc file.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
